SEARCH
Package schedule

Class ScheduleManager

java.lang.Object
schedule.ScheduleManager
public class ScheduleManager extends Object
The ScheduleManager class manages all the operations related to doctor schedules. It handles loading schedules from a CSV file, checking for conflicts, adding, removing, and displaying schedules, as well as validating the schedules and their time slots.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScheduleManager

  • Method Details

    • setFilePaths

      public static void setFilePaths()
      Updates the file paths for loading and saving schedule data by retrieving them from the SystemInitialisation class.

      This method centralizes the file path management, ensuring that the file paths are dynamically retrieved rather than hardcoded, improving maintainability and flexibility.

      File paths updated:

      • originalPath: Path to the original CSV file containing admin data.
      • updatedPath: Path to the updated CSV file for saving admin data.
      See Also:
      • SystemInitialisation.getFilePath(String)

    • removeInvalidSchedules

      public static void removeInvalidSchedules()
      Removes any schedules that are in the past.

    • loadSchedules

      public static void loadSchedules(boolean isFirstRun)
      Loads the schedules from the CSV file (original or updated based on the first run).
      Parameters:
      isFirstRun - true if the application is running for the first time; false otherwise.

    • duplicateSchedule

      public static void duplicateSchedule()
      Duplicates the current list of schedules to the updated CSV file.

    • displaySchedules

      public static void displaySchedules()
      Displays the current list of schedules. Removes any invalid schedules before displaying.

    • getScheduleOfDoctor

      public static List<Schedule> getScheduleOfDoctor(String doctorID)
      Retrieves the list of schedules for a specific doctor based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose schedules are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      A list of schedules for the specified doctor

    • isDoctorAvailable

      public static boolean isDoctorAvailable(String doctorID, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Checks if a specific doctor is available at a given date and time.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor
      date - The date for the check
      time - The time for the check
      Returns:
      true if the doctor is available, false otherwise

    • getSchedules

      public static List<Schedule> getSchedules()
      Retrieves all the schedules in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all the schedules

    • addSchedule

      public static void addSchedule(Schedule schedule)
      Adds a new schedule to the system and duplicates the schedule list in the updated CSV file.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The new schedule to add

    • removeSchedule

      public static void removeSchedule(Schedule schedule)
      Removes a schedule from the system and duplicates the schedule list in the updated CSV file.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The schedule to remove

    • checkDuplicateSchedule

      public static boolean checkDuplicateSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
      Checks if there is a duplicate schedule (same doctor, same date, and same time).
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the proposed schedule
      time - The time of the proposed schedule
      doctor - The doctor for whom the schedule is being checked
      Returns:
      true if a conflict exists, false otherwise

    • checkInterval

      public static boolean checkInterval(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
      Checks if there is a conflict with the time slots (ensures there is a 1-hour interval between slots).
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the proposed schedule
      time - The time of the proposed schedule
      doctor - The doctor for whom the schedule is being checked
      Returns:
      true if the proposed schedule conflicts with an existing one, false otherwise

    • checkValidSchedule

      public static boolean checkValidSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
      Validates a proposed schedule by checking for any duplicate schedules and interval conflicts.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the proposed schedule
      time - The time of the proposed schedule
      doctor - The doctor for whom the schedule is being checked
      Returns:
      true if the schedule is valid (no conflicts), false otherwise

    • checkValidTime

      public static boolean checkValidTime(LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Validates if the proposed time is in the future (i.e., the time is not in the past).
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the proposed schedule
      time - The time of the proposed schedule
      Returns:
      true if the time is in the future, false otherwise

    • removeDaySchedule

      public static void removeDaySchedule(LocalDate date, Doctor doctor)
